title: RK ROYAL KLUDGE 61 Mechanical Game Keyboard Brown Switch USB-C
item_description:
About this item
🌈MINI 60% KEYBOARD--RK61 is a ultra-compact layout keyboard with 61 keys. Concentrated all the key functions you need in minimalist design. Save more space for your mouse moving and neat the desktop. It’s most FPS gamers' choice for this 60% gaming keyboard.
🌈HOT SWAPPABLE Red Switch--The Wired RK ROYAL KLUDGE mechanical keyboard with red switches could be fast action with minimal resistance without a tactile bump feel, provides a smooth quiet click mechanical stroke experience. Perfect for office typing or playing games
🌈GORGEOUS RGB EFFECT--The RGB gaming keyboard has 18 RGB backlight modes and 8 monochrome backlight on board. Customized backlit colors and effects are also available through RK ROYAL KLUDGE software. Single key color is also controlled. Giving you more enjoyable when you gaming or typing at night
🌈SMOOTH GAMING EXPERIENCE--Hot swap mechanical keyboard is compatible with Windows, Linus and and Mac. Full keys anti-ghosting bring you more smooth gaming experience. Detachable USB-C keyboard cable make the quite gaming keyboard more portable and customized
🌈ERGONOMIC GAMING KEYBOARD--The design of this 60 percent mechanical keyboard is based on ergonomics. Scientific stair-up keycaps design brings maximum comfort, keeping your hand in a most natural state to minimize hand fatigue after longtime use. Perfect for gamer, office worker, copywriter, typing teacher and editors
Product Description
RK ROYAL KLUDGE RK61 60% RGB Mechancial Gaming Keyboard
UPGRADED Gaming Keyboard with QMK/VIA Programmable
QMK / VIA is open-source software for keyboards that allows anyone to program and remap each key easily and quickly. The upgraded rk61 QMK mechanical keyboard allow endless possibilities to Remap keys, Program macros, Backlit effects and more. Please upload below keymap file before using in QMK / VIA website.
 RK Software Driver: (Only for Windows system currently)
 bit.ly/RKRGBSOFT.
Choose version 4.5 software to download.
 VIA Website Address: (For Windows and Mac)
 usevia.app
(Please upload below keymap file before using in QMK / VIA website)
RK61 Layout for VIA: bit.ly/RK_QMK
 
 RK ROYAL KLUDGE RGB Mechanical Keyboard--BORN FOR GAMING
RK ROYAL KLUDGE is a manufacturer specializing in high-performance professional game equipment accessories with 10-year experience.
RK ROYAL KLUDGE have relentlessly pursued high standard craftsmanship, hign-class feel and high-performance of professional gaming equipment for the gamer. We have been working hard to provide you with more suitable products.
Wired RGB Mechanical Keyboard
Package Included:
RK61 White Gaming Keyboard*1
USB-C Wired*1
2-In-1 Keycap and Switch Puller*1
Spared RK Switches*4
User Manual*1
Resetting Keyboard: Long press FN+Space
Backlight Color Switch: Fn+.>
Backlight Color Mode Switch: Fn+\|
Backlight Color Brightness Switch: Fn+;: / '"
Backlight Color Speed Switch: Fn+[{ / ]}
WinOS Switch: Fn+A (System Windows Defaulted)
MacOS Switch: Fn+S
  Detachable USB-C Cable
Compartical for most of the USB-C cable. More convenient, portable and keyboard cable customize allowed
Mini Size
Compact 60% mechanical keyboard compact your desk
Get rid of oversize keyboard and crowded desk
Dimension: 11.4 x 4 x 1.6 Inch
Compatible Devices
RK61 gaming keyboard is compatible with PC, laptop, and xbox.
The QMK version is not compatible with PS4/5 and switch game console.
Ergonomically Curved
Ergonomically designed keycaps will reduce fatigue during long period of play. Perfect for long hours gaming and typing
Payment
Delivery details
Terms of sales
About us
Contact us
payment

title: RK ROYAL KLUDGE S98 Mechanical Game Keyboard RedSwitch BT/2.4G/USB-C 81 Keys LED
item_description:
About this item
75% RGB Mechanical Gasket Mount Keyboard: 75% layout with 81 keys, which makes the desktop more concise. This gaming keyboard features a gasket structure which uses gasket material between the plate and keyboard housing on both top and bottom sides. It gives the board a slightly cushioned feel, which provides a consistent, softer, and more comfortable typing feel and pleasing acoustic feedback.
OLED Smart Display and Knob: Royal Kludge M75 keyboard has built-in brand new OLED display and rotary knob. OLED screen design can display battery level, WIN/MAC, wired/2.4G/Bluetooth mode. And you can adjust volume, switch mode and switch the device with the rotary knob.
Triple Mode + Multi-device Connection: This hot swappable keyboard supports 3 connection modes, including USB-C wired mode, 2.4G wireless mode and Bluetooth 5.1 mode. Up to 3 devices can be connected via Bluetooth at the same time, and can be easily switched by the knob. Compatible with Win/Mac dual system, unlimited use.
Hot-Swappable Viridian Switch: This mechanical keyboard is equipped with the viridian switch. The total travel of pale green switch is 3.40mm and tactile force is 40gf, so the keypress of this switch delivers a linear response and quick rebound, which is perfect for both typing and gaming users.
Double-shot PBT Keycaps & South-facing RGB Backlight: RK M75 keyboard comes with double-shot PBT keycaps, which provides more comfortable fingertip feel with oil resistance for long-term use.The south-facing RGB is designed to better illuminate the keyboard backlight from the typist’s angle and free from interference while changing the switches.
 Product Description
RK ROYAL KLUDGE is a manufacturer focusing on high-performance professional gaming keyboard with 10 years of experience. Royal Kludge aims to provide gamers with high-quality craftsmanship, high-grade feel and high-performance professional gaming keyboard. We are always working hard to provide you with more suitable products.
RK ROYAL KLUDGE has a professional engineering and technical staff and R and D team to provide you with high-quality design and production. We are dedicated to improving the sense of gaming experience for every player. RK ROYAL KLUDGE M75 Tri-Mode Gasket Mechanical Keyboard, Hot-swap Brown Switch It is lighter, quieter, and easier to trigger than blue switches. It is suitable for the starters of a mechanical keyboard.
We're passionate about creating high-quality and innovative mechanical keyboards designed to enhance your computing experience. We believe that a mechanical keyboard should not only be functional and reliable, but also customizable and visually appealing.
We're committed to providing our customers with the best possible experience. Whether you're a gamer looking for the ultimate gaming keyboard or a professional seeking a reliable and efficient typing experience, we have a keyboard that's right for you.
Tri-modes Collection Gaming Keyboard
 75% Layout 81 Keys
 The RK M75 Mechanical Gaming Keyboard is designed for gamers who demand high performance and reliability. This keyboard features a compact design with 81 keys, making it easy to carry and use anywhere.
 Gasket Structure
 RK M75 wireless keyboard features a gasket structure, which uses gasket material between the plate and keyboard housing on both top and bottom sides. This gives the keyboared a soft keypress feel, which is really comforting and soft to type on.
 RGB Backlight
 This gaming keyboard also features adjustable RGB backlighting with multiple lighting modes, allowing you to customize the lighting to your preferences. Additionally, this wireless keyboard has a durable frame and a 2 in 1 Type-C USB cable for easy portability.
 Triple Mode + Multi-device Connection
 The RK M75 mechanical keyboard has three connection methods: wired, Bluetooth, and 2.4GHz. It can easily switch between 3 different wireless devices, and no longer limits the possibility of connection.
 All Keys Programmable
 Driver Software Link: bit.ly/RKRGBSOFT
(The programmer of this gaminng keyboard is only for Window system, plz run the software in wired mode ).
 Multi-functional display screen
display functions: battery level, WIN/MAC, wired/2.4G/BT mode, volume level, let this gaming keyboard status be clear at a glance, and remind you to charge.
PS: Rotate the knob to switch modes, short press to enter the mode, short press again to return to the mode selection page. Select RTN, short press the knob to return to the main interface.
RK M75 built-in rotary knob
Display Functions: power on/off, volume adjustment, switching mode. Multi-functional display screen, display functions: battery level, WIN/MAC, wired/2.4G/BT mode, volume level, let the keyboard status be clear at a glance, and remind you to charge.
How To Use And Switch The BT & 2.4G Mode?
Rotate the knob and choose BT1 mode
BT Pairing：
1. Short Press the knob to enter the mode switching options；
2. Turn the arrow to BT1, Long press the knob to enter BT1 pairing mode, and the display shows "BT Pairing"；
3. Turn on the Bluetooth of computer/phone, and search for the displayed name: RK-M75, then you will connect the device successfully.
Rotate the knob to 2.4G mode
2.4G Pairing：
1. Short Press the knob to enter the mode switching options;
2. Turn the arrow to 2.4G, Long press the knob to enter 2.4G pairing mode, and the display shows "2.4G Pairing"；
3. Plug in the 2.4G dongle; Successful pairing will return to the home screen.

 MULTIMIEDIA KEY & SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS
Multimieda Key for Windows
Windows system (Fn+A: switch to Windows system)
Fn+F1: Computer Fn+F2: Browser Fn+F3: Mailbox
Fn+F4: Calculator Fn+F5: Player Fn+F6: Stop Fn+F7: Last Song
Fn+F8: Play / Pause Fn+F9: Next Song Fn+ F10: Mute Fn+ F11: Volume- Fn+F12: Volume+
Multimieda Key for MAC
Mac system (Fn+S: switch to MAC system)
Fn+F7: Last Song Fn+F8: Play/Pause Fn+F9: Next Song
Fn+ F10: Mute Fn+ F11: Volume- Fn+F12: Volume+
Fn+Del: Screen Lock
Fn+PgUp: PrtSc
Fn+PgDn: Home
Fn+Pause: End
Fn+] }: Ins
  3 Indicator Lights
Allows you to easily judge capitalization, win/mac mode, and scroll lock status.
Two-stage Adjustable Tilt Legs
Anti-slip and two-stage adjustable tilt outriggers, available in two different heights according to different needs.
Type-C Ports
This PC gaming keyboard is coming with 2 Type-C ports, which allows to back up more facilities.
  Top
About this item

title: RK ROYAL KLUDGE S98 Mechanical Game Keyboard RedSwitch BT/2.4G/USB-C 81 Keys LED
item_description:
About this item
75% RGB Mechanical Gasket Mount Keyboard: 75% layout with 81 keys, which makes the desktop more concise. This gaming keyboard features a gasket structure which uses gasket material between the plate and keyboard housing on both top and bottom sides. It gives the board a slightly cushioned feel, which provides a consistent, softer, and more comfortable typing feel and pleasing acoustic feedback.
OLED Smart Display and Knob: Royal Kludge M75 keyboard has built-in brand new OLED display and rotary knob. OLED screen design can display battery level, WIN/MAC, wired/2.4G/Bluetooth mode. And you can adjust volume, switch mode and switch the device with the rotary knob.
Triple Mode + Multi-device Connection: This hot swappable keyboard supports 3 connection modes, including USB-C wired mode, 2.4G wireless mode and Bluetooth 5.1 mode. Up to 3 devices can be connected via Bluetooth at the same time, and can be easily switched by the knob. Compatible with Win/Mac dual system, unlimited use.
Hot-Swappable Viridian Switch: This mechanical keyboard is equipped with the viridian switch. The total travel of pale green switch is 3.40mm and tactile force is 40gf, so the keypress of this switch delivers a linear response and quick rebound, which is perfect for both typing and gaming users.
Double-shot PBT Keycaps & South-facing RGB Backlight: RK M75 keyboard comes with double-shot PBT keycaps, which provides more comfortable fingertip feel with oil resistance for long-term use.The south-facing RGB is designed to better illuminate the keyboard backlight from the typist’s angle and free from interference while changing the switches.
Product Description
Royal Kludge M75
 Gasket Structure
 RK M75 wireless keyboard features a gasket structure, which uses gasket material between the plate and keyboard housing on both top and bottom sides. This gives the keyboard a soft keypress feel, which is really comforting and soft to type on.
 South-facing RGB Backlight
 This gaming keyboard also features south-facing RGB backlit with multiple lighting modes, allowing you to customize the lighting to your preferences and better illuminating the keyboard backlight from the typist’s angle and free from interference while changing the switches.
 Double-shot PBT Keycaps
 This gaming keyboard is coming with the PBT keycaps. Compared with ABS keycaps, PBT keycaps has better high hardness, oil resistance and high temperature resistance.
Tri-modes Collection Gaming Keyboard
 Tenkeyless keyboard
 The RK M75 Mechanical Gaming Keyboard is 75% compact 81 keys, saving more space withour numpad, making it easy to carry and use anywhere.
 Triple Mode + Multi-device Connection
 The RK M75 mechanical keyboard has three connection methods: wired, Bluetooth, and 2.4GHz. It can easily switch between 3 different wireless devices, and no longer limits the possibility of connection.
 All Keys Programmable
 Driver Software Link: bit.ly/RKRGBSOFT (The programmer of this gaminng keyboard is only for Window system, kindly please run the software in wired mode).
Multi-functional Display Screen
Display functions: battery level, WIN/MAC, wired/2.4G/BT mode, volume level, let this gaming keyboard status be clear at a glance, and remind you to charge.
PS: Rotate the knob to switch modes, short press to enter the mode, short press again to return to the mode selection page. Select RTN, short press the knob to return to the main interface.
RK M75 built-in Rotary Knob
Display Functions: power on/off, volume adjustment, switching mode. Multi-functional display screen, display functions: battery level, WIN/MAC, wired/2.4G/BT mode, volume level, let the keyboard status be clear at a glance, and remind you to charge.
Multimiedia Key and System Requirements
 Multimieda Key for Windows
 Windows system (Fn+A: switch to Windows system)
Fn+F1: Computer Fn+F2: Browser Fn+F3: Mailbox
Fn+F4: Calculator Fn+F5: Player Fn+F6: Stop Fn+F7: Last Song
Fn+F8: Play / Pause Fn+F9: Next Song Fn+ F10: Mute Fn+ F11: Volume- Fn+F12: Volume+
 Multimieda Key for MAC
 Mac system (Fn+S: switch to MAC system)
Fn+F7: Last Song Fn+F8: Play/Pause Fn+F9: Next Song
Fn+ F10: Mute Fn+ F11: Volume- Fn+F12: Volume+
3 Indicator Lights
Allows you to easily judge capitalization, win/mac mode, and scroll lock status.
Two-stage Adjustable Tilt Legs
Anti-slip and two-stage adjustable tilt outriggers, available in two different heights according to different needs.

title: RK ROYAL KLUDGE S98 Mechanical Game Keyboard Brown Switch BT/2.4G/USB-C
item_description:
About this item
🎁【60% Percent Gasket Mount Mechanical Keyboard】: Compact gaming keyboard adopts a gasket structure with five layers of sound-absorbing material. There is poron cotton for buffering between the keyboard PCB board and the casing, which can effectively reduce the noise and vibrate of the keys, optimize the sound of the switches, and provide better typing experience
🎁【Metal Volume Knob & Indicator Lights】: The PC gaming keyboard is equipped with a high quality aluminum CNC metal knob. You can quickly adjust the volume of the device by rotating the knob, and press the knob to turn on/off the sound. There are three indicator lights next to the arrow keys, which can make the status of the keyboard clear at a glance. You could see few 60 percent keyboard comes with such good features
🎁【Hot Swappable & Pre-lubed Cream Switches】: Hot swappable mechanical keyboard comes with pre-lubed cream switch. These linear switches have a unique look, creamy sound and excellent smooth keystroke feel. Creamy and thocky sounding gives you unlimited fun while typing. High quality PCB board compatible with 3pin/5pin switches. You can have a high degree of customization
🎁【Dynamic RGB Backlight & QMK/VIA Programmable】: RGB gaming keyboard has more than 20 built-in backlight modes. A variety of dynamic RGB effects, monochrome, and full-color modes allow you to experience the unlimited fun of RGB. You can customize RGB modes and colors through software. The gaming keyboard supports QMK/VIA programming, you can easily redefine your keyboard
🎁【MDA Profile PBT Keycaps & Highly Compatible】: PBT keycaps are made of double shot technology, with a matte surface, non-fading, durability and longer service life. MDA Profile keycaps bring better tactile experience and better appearance. PC gaming keyboards compatible with Windows and MacOS, which can works perfectly on all kinds of devices
Product Description
60% Percent Gasket Mount Wired Gaming Keyboard - Black
R65 mechanical gaming keyboard keyboard adopts a gasket structure with multiple layers of sound insulation material inside, which can effectively reduce noise and provide you with a comfortable, soft typing feel and pleasing acoustic feedback. Equipped with pre-lubed cream switches, bring you creamy, thocky sounding and excellent smooth keystroke feeling.
This 60% percent mechanical gaming keyboard has many features such as hot swappable, dynamic RGB, volume knob, indicator lights, MDA profile PBT keycaps and QMK/VIA programable. You can enjoy the unlimited fun this gaming keyboard brings to you.
  Hot Swappable Cream Switch & MDA Profile PBT Keycaps
 Indicator Light: Equipped with three indicator lights, including Caps Lock, Win Lock, Mac OS. The status of this RGB gaming keyboard is at a glance.
3Pin/5Pin Hot Swappable: High quality PCB board compatible with 3pin/5pin switches. Compatible with 95% of keyboard switches on the market. You can have a high degree of customization
MDA Profile: Compared with ordinary keycaps, MDA Profile keycaps bring better tactile experience and better visual appearance, ergonomic design.
Pre-lubed Cream Switch: This hot swappable gaming keyboard is equipped with RK's customized pre-lubricated linear cream switch, combined with gasket structure, which has creamy, thocky sounding and excellent smooth keystroke feeling.
PBT Keycap: PBT keycaps are made of double-shot technology, with a matte surface, non-fading, durability and longer service life.
 Highly Customizable Programmable Gaming Keyboard
R65 mechanical gaming keyboard supports QMK/VIA programming, you can highly customize your keyboard through VIA software, including Macro editing, RGB customization, key redefine, knob redefine, etc.
QMK / VIA is an open source software for keyboards. You can deeply customize the keyboard functions through programming, or simply edit it through driver software such as VIA.
 VIA Website Address: usevia.app
RKR65 Layout for VIA: bit.ly/RK_QMK
 Tips: Please import the layout file into VIA software first.

 RK ROYAL KLUDGE RGB Mechanical Keyboard--BORN FOR GAMING
RK ROYAL KLUDGE have relentlessly pursued high standard craftsmanship, hign-class feel and high-performance of professional gaming equipment for the gamer. We have been working hard to provide you with more suitable products.
RK team will provide the best service to every customer within 24 hours to help you
RK R65 Gaming Keyboard
Package Included:
 R65 Gaming Keyboard *1
Spare RK Cream Switches*4
2-In-1 Keycap and Switch Puller*1
User Manual*1
Spare PBT Keycap
 FN+|\: Change RGB mode
FN+<,: Change RGB color
FN+Space Bar: Reset the keyboard
FN+WIN: Windows lock
FN+A: Change to Windows system
FN+S: Change to Mac system
FN+Left Ctrl: Conversion between number keys and function keys
FN+(F1～F12): Multimedia keys (Please refer to the manual for details)
  CNC Aluminum Volume Knob
The PC gaming keyboard is equipped with a high quality aluminum CNC metal knob. You can quickly adjust the volume of the device by rotating the knob, and press the knob to turn on/off the sound
Two-stage Adjustable Feet Stand
The feet stand has three adjustable angles, please choose the angle that suits you best to reduce fatigue during use. It also has an anti-slip design to improve the friction between the keyboard and the desktop, ergonomically designed
Extreme Silence Design
R65 gaming keyboard takes noise reduction to the extreme. In addition to the multiple silencing materials inside the keyboard, the space key uses multiple layers of silencing foam to make the sound more pleasant
Gasket Structure with Single Key Slotted
Each key has an independent slotted, combined with the gasket structure, which makes the typing feel softer and improves the comfort of the keys. Please enjoy the pleasure brought by every click
